name: Apex Legends - Loba Edition
description:
Traffic in victory with the Apex Legends™ - Loba Edition, armed with everything you need to outfit her as the ultimate black market provider of ‘high caliber accessories.'

• The Loba Edition includes:
• Legendary "Arms Dealer" Loba Skin
• Legendary "Silver Lining" 30-30 Repeater Skin
• "Fractal Wolf" Gun Charm
• "Quartermaster Andrade" Badge
• 1,000 Apex Coins
